## Navigation.showMiscToggleButton property

Boolean attribute which controls whether to show the miscellaneous (menu) icon on the navigation bar Control via `show-luminance-toggle-button`

**Signature:**

```typescript
showMiscToggleButton: boolean;
```

## Remarks

If the user clicks the icon when shown then this class will emit the 'misc-icon-clicked' event
